title: What is the matter with players tonight and recently?
body:
Last game I get a Blitz supporting our Teemo, he does nothing for the first few minutes, just sits there, dies and goes AFK in the fountain, than he proceeds to run the gauntlet up the middle.

Before that I get an Annie supporting me in lane, who built AD.

Game before that I had an Ekko 'support' who just sat behind the minions and attacked 4 times in ~15 minutes.

All my recent supports actually asked to go there only to troll it seems. I thought when the Blitz got picked we may actually have a chance, I was wrong about that.

At least when I get last pick and forced to support I pre warn my team I can't do it.

Any advice what to do when our support just trolls you? Or is there nothing you can do?

replies.body: I hope you dont play ranked if you cant support..
